scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross, his head bowed and body showing signs of suffering. A halo surrounds his head, and the inscription 'INRI' is visible above. To the left of the cross, a winged angel in an orange robe hovers, reaching towards Christ. Below the cross, a group of mourners is gathered. The Virgin Mary, draped in a blue mantle, is supported by another woman in green, while a third figure in red stands behind them. To the right of the cross, several figures are present, including a man in a green hat and blue tunic, another in a blue and white patterned garment, and a soldier in an orange tunic and blue armor holding a bow. The ground beneath them is green, with a skull and bone visible, symbolizing Golgotha. The background is a vibrant red with an ornate pattern, and the entire scene is framed by an arched border with gold illumination.
